citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30 pm on
27-Aug-18.
The inspector arrived at the facility at 3:30 pm and spoke to a household member who stated that the licensee was
not available for the inspection. The inspector then left the facility.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30 pm on
27-Aug-18.
The inspector arrived at the facility at 3:30 pm and spoke to a household member who stated that the licensee was
not available for the inspection.  The inspector then left the facility.
